news.title: Shares of high fructose syrup producer ADM tumble after Trump says Coca-Cola agrees to use real cane sugar
news.summary: Archer-Daniels-Midland plummeted on Thursday after President Trump said that Coca-Cola has agreed to use real cane sugar in its drinks in the U.S.

news.title: Uber inks six-year robotaxi deal with Lucid, invests $300 million in EV company
news.summary: Uber, Lucid and autonomous vehicle startup Nuro are joining forces to deploy more than 20,000 robotaxis as demand for driverless cars kicks into high gear.

news.title: Disney's spent 70 years funneling IP into its theme parks. Here's why it works
news.summary: Disney's portfolio of intellectual property has been the bedrock of its theme parks since Disneyland first opened 70 years ago in 1955. Disney's portfolio is made up of more than 1,000 patents, trademarks and copyrights.

news.title: PepsiCo earnings beat estimates even as U.S. demand falls
news.summary: PepsiCo reiterated its full-year outlook after its quarterly earnings and revenue topped estimates. PepsiCo also raised its forecast for the full year.

news.title: Crypto regulation bills move forward after record-setting House vote
news.summary: President Donald Trump intervened Tuesday evening to get the holdouts on board. The second attempt to advance a pair of crypto bills came after President Donald Trump intervening Tuesday evening.

news.title: These market whales may hold the key to the stock market’s next move, says former trader
news.summary: Former institutional trader Kevin Muir flags caution on chasing this market. Muir sees some big market whales nearing the end of a U.S. stock buying spree.

news.title: Inside the great ETF boom of 2025: ‘How do you navigate all this?’
news.summary: A record flood of new cash. Hedge-fund and private-equity firms getting in. Exchange-traded funds are the big investing story of the year.

news.title: Why this ex-Goldman strategist now at Citadel is bullish on stocks — until September
news.summary: Scott Rubner, a former Goldman Sachs tactical strategist now at Citadel Securities, said it’s too soon to fade the stock market given factors including corporate stock buybacks.

news.title: GE’s stock leaps to 25-year high after blowout earnings, as jet engine orders soar
news.summary: GE Aerospace’s stock rises toward a 25-year high after earnings beat expectations on multiple fronts and the full-year outlook saw a big increase.

news.title: Retail sales snap back after trade wars die down. Economy still expanding at decent pace.
news.summary: Sales at retailers rebounded in June after the White House dialed back high U.S. tariffs. Consumers temporarily shrugged off trade wars and spent more on cars, clothes, do-it-yourself projects and dining out.
